page.title: 09SANDFORD SCHOOL: AMENITIES
page.content: The school provides a number of extra-curricula facilities. For sport they have playing fields and tennis courts. They have had an Olympic high-jumper and a tennis player who played at Wimbledon. For art they have two rooms, a specialist art room and a pottery room. For science their own fully equiped laboratory. They do drama but have no stage or lighting facility. For technical studies they have a woodwork room and a design room. The school has a formal timetable, however it is very flexible and can be altered by the teacher depending upon the situation. The school is designed and run so that the pupils when they leave it will have the same prospects as children from any other school.
